questions: I struggle to fully relax, even when I am safe and off duty
I automatically scan people, rooms, or environments without thinking
I feel more tense or on edge at home than I used to
My sleep feels light, broken, or unrefreshing
I feel physically tense most of the time
I feel emotionally flat, numb, or disconnected
I am more irritable or short-tempered than I want to be
I struggle to switch my mind off, especially at night
I feel mentally exhausted even after time off
My outlook on people or the world has become more negative or cynical
I withdraw from family or loved ones without meaning to
I rely on distractions to avoid thinking or feeling
My sense of who I am is closely tied to being a police officer
I worry about how the job may be affecting me long-term
